statements: SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, location FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, ST_X(location) AS latitude, ST_Y(location) AS longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, location FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location, user_id FROM user_locations WHERE ST_Distance(location, ST_MakePoint(0, 0)) < 1000;
SELECT user_id, ST_X(location), ST_Y(location) FROM user_locations WHERE ST_Distance(location, ST_MakePoint(5, 5)) < 500;
SELECT ST_AsText(location), user_id FROM user_locations WHERE ST_Contains(ST_MakeEnvelope(0, 0, 10, 10), location);
SELECT user_id, ST_Distance(location, ST_MakePoint(10, 10)) AS distance FROM user_locations ORDER BY distance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM user_locations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT check_in_time, user_id FROM check_ins ORDER BY check_in_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM user_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude ASC;
SELECT user_id, check_in_time FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, c.check_in_time, u.location_name FROM user_locations u INNER JOIN check_ins c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.check_in_time > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY c.check_in_time ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_check_ins, u.location_name FROM check_ins c INNER JOIN user_locations u ON c.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY u.location_name HAVING total_check_ins > 3 ORDER BY total_check_ins DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM check_ins ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT location_name FROM user_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT u.location_name, c.check_in_time FROM user_locations u JOIN check_ins c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM user_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%mall%'
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90
SELECT u.user_id, l.location_name, c.check_in_time FROM user_locations u JOIN locations l ON u.location_name = l.location_name JOIN check_ins c ON u.user_id = c.user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.000;
SELECT id, user_id, location_id, check_in_time FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE longitude < -80.000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id, check_in_time FROM check_ins WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY check_in_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 10 AND latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -100.0;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, location FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, location_id, checkin_time FROM check_ins WHERE checkin_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, receive_promotions, notification_sound FROM user_preferences WHERE receive_promotions = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT checkin_time, location_name FROM check_ins JOIN locations ON check_ins.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT users.username, locations.location_name, check_ins.checkin_time FROM users JOIN check_ins ON users.id = check_ins.user_id JOIN locations ON check_ins.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT users.username, user_preferences.receive_promotions FROM users LEFT JOIN user_preferences ON users.id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL;
